description:
UBports Foundation will switch to a fixed-released model to deliver bug and security fixes faster than before for a more stable and reliable Ubuntu Touch experience.

The post UBports Is Switching to a Fixed-Release Model for Ubuntu Touch OTA Updates appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: UBports Is Switching to a Fixed-Release Model for Ubuntu Touch OTA Updates

description:
SparkyLinux 2024.02 distribution is now available for download based on Debian Testing and powered by Linux kernel 6.6.13 LTS. Here's what's new!

The post SparkyLinux 2024.02 Improves CLI Installer, Adds More Debian Trixie Updates appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: SparkyLinux 2024.02 Improves CLI Installer, Adds More Debian Trixie Updates
